mapper.select: select * from USERBOARD where user_id like #{user_ID}
select DISTINCT day1, day2 from Y_M_BOARD where bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into MAINBOARD ( bno , user_ID , c_code , boardType , title , text ,price) values (#{bno} , #{user_ID}, #{c_code} , #{boardType} , #{title} , #{text} , #{price} )
insert into TEXTBOARD ( bno , text1, text2, text3) values(#{bno},#{text1},#{text2},#{text3})

insert into Y_M_BOARD( bno, rno, day1 , day2 , exText, M_time1,M_time2, Money , addrBasic,addrDetail, entX , entY) values( #{bno} ,#{rno} , #{day1} , #{day2} , #{exText} , #{M_time1} , #{M_time2} , #{Money} , #{addrBasic} , #{addrDetail} , #{entX} , #{entY} )
insert into IMGBOARD( bno , img) values(#{bno},#{img})
insert into D_T_BOARD (bno, rno , M_day) values(#{bno},#{rno},#{ M_day})
